name: graphql-schema-collector
description: Scripts to collect GraphQL schema definition files from GitHub.

scripts.preprocess: npm run build && node lib/addGithubDuplicate.js && node lib/addType.js && node lib/addContainsQueryType.js
scripts.preprocess-refactored: npm run build && node lib/mergeSchemas.js && node lib/addValidSchema.js && node lib/addContentDuplicate_preprocessed.js

author: Erik Wittern, Alan Cha, James C. Davis, Guillaume Baudart, Louis Mandel
